meanings.sent1: In the future, our posteriorities will shape the world.

meanings.sent3: The posteriorities of tomorrow are the decisions we make today.
meanings.sent4: The impact of our actions ripples through the posteriorities of time.
meanings.sent5: Our posteriorities are like footprints in the sand, marking our path through history.

meanings.definition: The state of being later in time
meanings.sent1: As we progress, we move towards the posteriorities of the future.
meanings.sent2: Learning from the posteriorities of the past helps us make better decisions.
meanings.sent3: It's fascinating to think about the posteriorities that await us.
meanings.sent4: The posteriorities of the future hold endless possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The posteriorities of time march forward, never looking back.

meanings.definition: The quality of being situated behind or at the rear
meanings.sent1: The posteriorities of the building provide a scenic view of the city.
meanings.sent2: The car's posteriorities were damaged in the accident.
